s1.name: External softwares
s1.p: JORAM uses the following external softwares:

ul.li:
JavaCup is a Java parser generator used in JORAM message selection feature. It is covered by the
CUP Parser Generator Copyright Notice, License, and Disclaimer.
kXML is an XML parser for J2ME used by kJORAM for communicating with a JORAM platform. It is covered by the Enhydra Public License.
Regexp is a regular expression parser used in JORAM message selection feature. It is covered by the Apache license.
SOAP is an implementation of the SOAP protocol used by JORAM's SOAP proxy. It is covered by the Apache license.
Xerces is an XML parser used for JORAM platform configuration. It is is covered by the Apache license.
